summary: An email dated October 7, 2019, from a contractor to an unspecified recipient, listing a series of alleged sexual abuse incidents involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The allegations describe inappropriate touching, massages, and coercive situations in New York City and New Mexico.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as the perpetrator in multiple alleged incidents of inappropriate touching, spooning, and coercive behavior with a victim, and as the recipient of massages.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Alleged to have participated in and facilitated abuse, including giving a nude massage, instructing on how Epstein likes foot massages, and being present during inappropriate touching.

connections.description: Alleged to have worked together in orchestrating and participating in abusive acts against a victim, including joint massage sessions and instructions on preferences.
Both are described as perpetrators in alleged abusive incidents involving a victim, with Maxwell facilitating and Epstein as the primary recipient of acts.

events.title: Movie Theatre Incident in NYC
events.description: Alleged inappropriate rubbing of hand and leg by Epstein in a movie theatre in New York City.

events.title: Foot Massages in New Mexico
events.description: Alleged foot massages in New Mexico involving Maxwell, who gave pointers on how Epstein likes it, followed by another round of inappropriate touching in a movie theatre.

events.title: Bedroom Spooning Incident
events.description: Alleged incident where Epstein climbed into bed with a victim for spooning and touching.

events.title: Nude Massage by Maxwell
events.description: Alleged incident where Maxwell gave a nude massage to a victim, with Epstein present but not participating.

events.title: Joint Foot Massage Request
events.description: Alleged incident where the victim was asked to give a foot massage to both Epstein and Maxwell on a bed, after which both started inappropriate behavior, causing the victim to run away fearing rape.

keyFacts: The document lists specific, detailed allegations of sexual abuse and coercion by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell against a victim.
Incidents are alleged to have occurred in multiple locations, including New York City and New Mexico.
Ghislaine Maxwell is described as an active participant and facilitator, giving instructions on how to please Epstein.
The victim reported being afraid of rape and fleeing from a situation involving both Epstein and Maxwell.
The document is an email from a contractor, suggesting these allegations were being compiled or reported to a third party in 2019.
